channel.name: TVNZ 1 NZ
channel.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond The Lobby
channel.desc: Rob and Monica work in one of Europe's last remaining family-owned 'grande dame' hotels, boasting a deep history and celebrity clientele list right in the heart of the Eternal City.

channel.name: TVNZ 1 NZ
channel.title: Coronation Street
channel.desc: Long-running drama with the residents of England's most famous cobbled street.

channel.name: TVNZ 1 NZ
channel.title: Deal Or No Deal Australia
channel.desc: Join host Grant Denyer for a round of this high pressure and high stakes game show, where contestants face up to the Banker and must decide: is it deal or no deal.
